member.name: M:GitVersion.BuildAgents.Jenkins.ShouldCleanUpRemotes
member.summary: When Jenkins uses pipeline-as-code, it creates two remotes: "origin" and "origin1". This should be cleaned up, so that normizaling the Git repo will not fail.

member.name: M:GitVersion.GitPreparer.NormalizeGitDirectory(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Normalization of a git directory turns all remote branches into local branches, turns pull request refs into a real branch and a few other things. This is designed to be run *only on the build server* which checks out repositories in different ways. It is not recommended to run normalization against a local repository

member.summary: Detects the encoding of a file if and only if it includes a preamble .
member.param: The file name to check the encoding of.
member.returns: The encoding of the file if it has a preamble otherwise null.

member.name: M:GitVersion.Helpers.EncodingHelper.DetectEncoding(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Returns the first encoding where all the preamble bytes match exactly.
member.param: The bytes to check for a matching preamble.
member.returns: The encoding that has a matching preamble or null if one was not found.

member.name: M:GitVersion.Helpers.EncodingHelper.ScanEncodings
member.summary: Returns an ordered list of encodings that have preambles ordered by the length of the preamble longest to shortest. This prevents a short preamble masking a longer one later in the list.
member.returns: An ordered list of encodings and corresponding preambles.

member.name: M:GitVersion.Helpers.EncodingHelper.PreambleMatches(System.Text.Encoding,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Verifies that all bytes of an encoding's preamble are present at the beginning of some sample data.
member.returns: A boolean indicating if a preamble match was found.

member.name: M:GitVersion.Helpers.StringFormatWithExtension.FormatWith``1(System.String,``0,GitVersion.IEnvironment)
member.summary: Formats the , replacing each expression wrapped in curly braces with the corresponding property from the or .
member.param: The source template, which may contain expressions to be replaced, e.g '{Foo.Bar.CurrencySymbol} foo {Foo.Bar.Price}'
The source object to apply to the
member.exception: An environment variable was null and no fallback was provided.
member.remarks: An expression containing "." is treated as a property or field access on the . An expression starting with "env:" is replaced with the value of the corresponding variable from the . Each expression may specify a single hardcoded fallback value using the {Prop ?? "fallback"} syntax, which applies if the expression evaluates to null.

member.summary: Contextual information about where GitVersion is being run

member.name: M:GitVersion.VersionCalculation.IVersionStrategy.GetVersions
member.summary: Calculates the values.
member.returns: An of the base version values found by the strategy.

member.name: T:GitVersion.VersionCalculation.ConfigNextVersionVersionStrategy
member.summary: Version is from NextVersion (the configuration value), unless the current commit is tagged. BaseVersionSource is null. Does not increment.

member.name: T:GitVersion.VersionCalculation.FallbackVersionStrategy
member.summary: Version is 0.1.0. BaseVersionSource is the "root" commit reachable from the current commit. Does not increment.

member.name: T:GitVersion.VersionCalculation.MergeMessageVersionStrategy
member.summary: Version is extracted from older commits's merge messages. BaseVersionSource is the commit where the message was found. Increments if PreventIncrementForMergedBranchVersion (from the branch config) is false.

member.name: T:GitVersion.VersionCalculation.TaggedCommitVersionStrategy
member.summary: Version is extracted from all tags on the branch which are valid, and not newer than the current commit. BaseVersionSource is the tag's commit. Increments if the tag is not the current commit.

member.name: T:GitVersion.VersionCalculation.TrackReleaseBranchesVersionStrategy
member.summary:
Active only when the branch is marked as IsDevelop. Two different algorithms (results are merged):
Using : Version is that of any child branches marked with IsReleaseBranch (except if they have no commits of their own). BaseVersionSource is the commit where the child branch was created. Always increments.
Using : Version is extracted from all tags on the master branch which are valid. BaseVersionSource is the tag's commit (same as base strategy). Increments if the tag is not the current commit (same as base strategy).

member.name: T:GitVersion.VersionCalculation.VersionInBranchNameVersionStrategy
member.summary: Version is extracted from the name of the branch. BaseVersionSource is the commit where the branch was branched from its parent. Does not increment.

member.name: M:GitVersion.VersionCalculation.MainlineVersionCalculator.GetEffectiveMainlineTip(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{LibGit2Sharp.Commit},LibGit2Sharp.Commit,LibGit2Sharp.Commit)
member.summary: Gets the commit on mainline at which was fully integrated.
member.param: The collection of commits made directly to mainline, in reverse order.
The best possible merge base between and the current commit.
The tip of the mainline branch.
member.returns: The commit on mainline at which was merged, if such a commit exists; otherwise, .
member.remarks: This method gets the most recent commit on mainline that should be considered for versioning the current branch.

member.name: M:GitVersion.VersionCalculation.MainlineVersionCalculator.FindMergeBaseBeforeForwardMerge(LibGit2Sharp.Commit,LibGit2Sharp.Branch,LibGit2Sharp.Commit@)
member.summary: Gets the best possible merge base between the current commit and that is not the child of a forward merge.
member.param: The commit that establishes the contextual base version.
The commit on mainline at which the returned merge base was fully integrated.
member.returns: The best possible merge base between the current commit and that is not the child of a forward merge.

member.name: F:GitVersion.IncrementStrategy.Inherit
member.summary: Uses the , and of the "parent" branch (i.e. the branch where the current branch was branched from).

summary.para: l - Legacy SemVer tag for systems which do not support SemVer 2.0 properly [1.2.3-beta4]
lp - Legacy SemVer tag for systems which do not support SemVer 2.0 properly (padded) [1.2.3-beta0004]
b - Formats just the build number
s - Formats the build number and the Git Sha
f - Formats the full build metadata
p - Formats the padded build number. Can specify an integer for padding, default is 4. (i.e., p5)

member.name: M:GitVersion.SemanticVersionPreReleaseTag.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary:
Default formats:
t - SemVer 2.0 formatted tag [beta.1]
l - Legacy SemVer tag with the tag number padded. [beta1]
lp - Legacy SemVer tag with the tag number padded. [beta0001]. Can specify an integer to control padding (i.e., lp5)
